---

title: "Machine learning methodology for high throughput personalized neutron dose reconstruction in mixed neutron + photon exposures"
excerpt: "We implemented machine learning in the radiation biodosimetry field to quantitatively reconstruct neutron doses in mixed neutron + photon exposures, which are expected in improvised nuclear device detonations."
